onFocusChanged(android.view.View,java.la.Description: This method is called when the TextView that uses this TransformationMethod gains or loses focus.
onFocusChanged(android.view.View,java.la.FullName: public void onFocusChanged (View view, CharSequence sourceText, boolean focused, int direction, Rect previouslyFocusedRect)

getOriginal().Description: Returns the list of characters that are to be replaced by other characters when displayed.

getReplacement().Description: Returns a parallel array of replacement characters for the ones that are to be replaced.

getTransformation(java.lang.CharSequence.Description: Returns a CharSequence that will mirror the contents of the source CharSequence but with the characters in @B_android#text#method#ReplacementTransformationMethod#getOriginal_E@ replaced by ones from @B_android#text#method#ReplacementTransformationMethod#getReplacement_E@.
getTransformation(java.lang.CharSequence.FullName: public CharSequence getTransformation (CharSequence source, View v)

ClassDesc: This transformation method causes the characters in the @B_android#text#method#ReplacementTransformationMethod#getOriginal_E@ array to be replaced by the corresponding characters in the @B_android#text#method#ReplacementTransformationMethod#getReplacement_E@ array.
